content.description: Swamp Thing is the flake on the far right. Start on obvious jug and work your hands up to the next few holds. After you have to hug your way up using the back side of the flake. Use the flake only for both hand and feet.
content.location: Far right flake on Swamp Thing Wall.

content.description: Swamp Boogie is the long traverse on the Swamp Thing Wall.  Start on he far left on the jug and work your way up and keep your feet on the the lip that runs the length of the wall. All hands should be on the face, do not use the top of the wall. You can traverse from left to right or top out along the seam on the far right end.
content.location: On the face of Swamp Thing Wall.

content.description: Sit start directly below the large seam/crack. Work your way up using the seam/crack only. Top out is very easy.
content.location: Find large seam/crack, sit start on obvious lip.

pathTokens: Rocky Hollow Area at Garret Mountain

content.description: Swamp Thing Wall is the first face you will see walking from the Tower Parking Area. It holds a few seam problems, a traverse and a interesting flake problem. However, the Swamp Thing Wall is usually surrounded by...well a swamp. Best time to climb is the summer if dry and fall. Spring season usually leaves the landings under water.
